attributes.action: Increase the minimum wage for 16 year olds to £6.81
attributes.additional_details: I am a 16 year old and I work as hard as any adult in my work place but am being paid less then the minimum wage to live off.
attributes.background: We need the government to raise the minimum wage of 16 year olds by at least £2 as we are doing the same jobs as any adults but being discriminated against for our age.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Stop the age discrimination for wages. Pay all ages the National Living Wage: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618790
